attributes.action: Make electric kickbikes and scooters legally allowed to be driven in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Government and local authorities have to step up and make changes in the same ways for cyclists for kickbikes and electric personal transport devices

We need a change now not when it's late for the planet and allowing a choice of transport making our streets safe for everyone..
attributes.background: As we go forward, climate change emergency continues to be a more and more of a concern, we are trying in different ways to make a change for our planet, so we need to allow new ways of transport and innovations to advance and not block them.
